bug.author: PeteBlackerThe3rd
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
N/A Error in online documentation <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
The documentation page at: <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/modules/features2d/doc/common_interfaces_of_feature_detectors.html#featuredetector-create>http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/modules/features2d/doc/common_interfaces_of_feature_detectors.html#featuredetector-create</denchmark-link>
Has an error in the note at the end of the section. The second bullet point reads "Add an initialisation function at the start of your code: initModules_nonfree();" The identifier should does not contain an 's' it should read "initModule_nonfree();" I had to dig into the header files to figure my way through this one. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Goto : <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/modules/features2d/doc/common_interfaces_of_feature_detectors.html#featuredetector-create>http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/modules/features2d/doc/common_interfaces_of_feature_detectors.html#featuredetector-create</denchmark-link>
Read section on FeatureDetector::create Observe typo in note at the end of this section.

comments.comment: Fix submitted! Thanks for the report!
